name: ilogmein
title: Log Me In
description: An elegant in-page login manager similar to Opera's Wand login (Android and e10s Friendly).
author: Sarah Avilov

preferences.name: combo
preferences.title: Login with keyboard shortcut (hotkey):
preferences.description: Enter a combination of a-z keys with one or more modifiers. Examples of valid hotkeys: 'accel-s', 'meta-shift-i', 'control-alt-d'. Available modifiers: shift, alt, meta, control, accel, pageup, pagedown. On Macintosh, 'alt' is the Option key, 'meta' and 'accel' are the Command key. On Windows and Linux, 'accel' is the Control key.

preferences.name: timeout
preferences.title: Hide the login button after (in seconds):
preferences.description: Minimum acceptable value is 10 seconds. Recommended value is 60 seconds.
